definition: at or to or toward the back or rear, directed or moving toward the rear, direction toward the rear
details:
adverb
- at or to or toward the back or rear
= synonyms: back
adjective
- directed or moving toward the rear
= example: directed or moving toward the rear
= synonyms: reverse
- located in or toward the back or rear
= synonyms: rear
noun
- direction toward the rear
= example: direction toward the rear
